jobDescription: Requisition ID: 635 Truck Driver Pay & Benefits Full-time  Cardinal Logistics Management Company  Truck Driver $1400.00 per week guarantee***  Dedicated Company Driver | $4,000 Sign-on, $72,800 Annually  Regional/Local RunsCLICK HERE TO APPLY CDL truck drivers are eligible for: $4,000 Sign-on Bonus  $2,000 Retention Bonus every 6 months of service.  Safety/Referral Bonuses  Dedicated Regional AND Local Runs  2016 Day Cabs / Sleepers  Great Home-time  Paid Orientation and Training  Comprehensive Affordable Benefits Package after 30 days  Health/Dental/Vision and 401(k)CLICK HERE TO APPLY Truck Driver Qualifications  Class A Commercial Driver's License (CDL-A)  Prefer driver with Doubles Endorsement  9 Months of T/T experience in the last 3 yrs, or 2 in the last 5 yrs  22+ yrs. of age  EEO/AAA/m/f/Vets/Disabled  Contact:Bobby Carson, Operations Manager Cardinal Logistics Management Inc. www.cardlog.com Email: Bcarson@cardlog.com Mobile: 510-447-3945
